item.title: Antisocial behaviour, 29th August
item.description:
Lots of men gather here every single day blasting loud music smoking weed and shouting til late at night everyone is getting sick of it it’s not fair to everyone else living here
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bradstock Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle blocking access, 29th August
item.description:
A large dark vehicle has been left unattended on the pavement for several hours and remains there blocking access to the 17 properties in Coopers Mews BR3. If it remains in its current position people can neither enter or leave the mews, including the dustmen who are due tomorrow morning.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coopers Mews, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: It's completely dark at night, feels unsafe, 29th August
